headline: Wells Fargo Hits 52-Week High: Is WFC Stock Worth Considering?
summary: WFC hits 52-week high, driven by deposit growth, solid balance sheet and cost management. Yet, lower loan balance & declining mortgage banking income are woes.

headline: BlackRock Large Cap Focus Value Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
